current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To provide for an accounting of total United States
		  contributions to the United Nations.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced the
			 following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

header.#text:
Report
			 on United States contributions to the United Nations

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Director of the Office of Management and Budget

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
a
			 report on all assessed and voluntary contributions, including in-kind, of the
			 United States Government to the

and its affiliated agencies and
			 related bodies during the previous fiscal year.

text.#text:
Not later than 90
			 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, and annually thereafter, the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
United Nations affiliated agencies
			 and related bodies

text.#text:
The total amount
			 of all assessed and voluntary contributions, including in-kind, of the United
			 States Government to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
affiliated agency or body in such fiscal year when compared with all
			 contributions to such agency or body from any source in such fiscal
			 year.

text.#text:
The approximate
			 percentage of United States Government contributions to each

a description of

the department or

the purpose of

Director of the Office
